content: Now we know why the Obama administration doesn't want us to call them "enemy combatants"--they want us to say "howdy neighbor!" quote: Attorny Gen. Eric Holder: For "people who can be released there are a variety of options that we have and among them is the possibility that we would release them into this country," Holder said.
